nodes.text: "Wired to Kill" is an adventure seed for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game from Wizards of the Coast. It was written by Craig Robert Carey, Jason Fry, and Daniel Wallace and published as part of the magazine article "Endor and the Moddell Sector" in Star Wars Gamer 9, published in 2002. The adventure takes place during the New Jedi Order era and pairs the player characters with the Taloron crime lord and drug smuggler "Blue" Imcrix as he attempts to reach a cache of slow-matured Rokna Blue spice at a processing station before the New Republic Security Force can demolish the station, which they assume to be malfunctioning.
